=Description=
This is a content plugin for [http://www.ghisler.com/ Total Commander] to display audio file tags, edit tags, search in tags, etc.
Powered by [http://developer.kde.org/~wheeler/taglib.html TagLib Audio Meta-Data Library].

Supported file formats:
 * MP3,
 * MPC,
 * FLAC,
 * Ogg FLAC,
 * Ogg Vorbis,
 * Speex,
 * MP4 and
 * ASF (WMA).

=Functionality=
Tags supported for reading and writing:
 * title,
 * artist,
 * album,
 * year,
 * tracknumber,
 * comment,
 * genre.

Readonly tags:
 * bitrate,
 * samplerate,
 * channels,
 * length,
 * tag type.
